entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:35 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 9:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Humidity: 62 %

Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
